Interface UserDAO

public interface UserDAO
Data Access Object interface for User operations

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    create(RegistrationModel user)
    Creates a new user
    boolean
    exists(String username)
    Checks if a username already exists

    findByUsername(String username)
    Finds a user by their username

  • Method Details

    • create

      boolean create(RegistrationModel user)
      Creates a new user
      Parameters:
      user - the user to create
      Returns:
      true if creation was successful

    • findByUsername

      RegistrationModel findByUsername(String username)
      Finds a user by their username
      Parameters:
      username - the username to search for
      Returns:
      the found user or null if not found

    • exists

      boolean exists(String username)
      Checks if a username already exists
      Parameters:
      username - the username to check
      Returns:
      true if the username exists
